casebody.data:
Barbara Wilkinson CAMPBELL and Debra S. Alyea
v.
Christopher K. BOWMAN, John Anthony Burris, Janet R. Burris, David Burch, Tony Burris Quarter Horses and Aquoforce, Inc. No. 714P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. John F. Bloss, Greensboro, for Campbell & Alyea. Perry C. Henson, Jr., Karen Strom Talley, Greensboro, for Bowman, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th day of December 2005 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2006."

Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
